text: Emmy Köhler, born 22 May 1858 in Stockholm, Sweden, died 2 February 1925 in Fresta, Sweden was a Swedish hymnwriter and writer. Among her more famous works is the Christmas carol Nu tändas tusen juleljus and the music for the children's Christmas song Raska fötter springa tripp, tripp, tripp ("Liten julvisa"). The lyrics of the later mentioned song were written by Sigrid Sköldberg-Pettersson. == References == Category:1858 births Category:1925 deaths Category:Musicians from Stockholm Category:Writers from Stockholm
title: Emmy Köhler
